data.title: Tasia "Tess" Hutton Obituary
data.text:
Obituary

Tasia “Tess” Hutton, 83, of Marengo, died peacefully on May 5th, 2023 surrounded by her loving family.

Tasia was born March 17, 1940 in Chicago, the daughter of Theodore and Kanella Kolovos. She married Charles Hutton on October 14, 1972.

Tess was eighty-three years young. As the matriarch, she was the connector of all family members and was always involved in her children’s lives. She was always in “the know” and you couldn’t hide a thing from her.

She was a mother of five, and there was never a dull moment when her kids were growing up. She embraced and welcomed all their friends into her house and thrived when her home was full of chaos.

Tess never missed her Fox News, and loved to go shopping; she was especially fond of Bed Bath & Beyond, and will continue to grow her vacuum collection in heaven. Tess was a great dancer and had a love of all music, from Dean Martin to Adele, and even Bruno Mars and Michael Bublé. She was beautiful and had a fabulous sense of style; she was dreaming of patent leather purses throughout her last days. She was a loving mother, grandmother and great grandmother who will be missed by all who knew her.

Tess is survived by her children, Elizabeth Bullock, Deborah (Rick) Bowar, Victoria (Mike) Dellas, Michael Nowak and John (Dawn) Hutton, 12 grandchildren, 8 great grandchildren, her sisters, Kathryn Stanek and Frances Levy. She was preceded in death by her parents, and her husband.

Visitation will be held on Friday, May 19, 2023 from 4-7pm, with a service beginning at 6:30pm at DeFiore Funeral Home-10763 Dundee Road, Huntley. For further information please contact the funeral home at 847-515-8772 or online condolences may be directed to www.defiorefuneral.com

Joan Ruud 2023-05-09 22:24:40

Dawn, John and family. I am so sorry for your loss. She was blessed to have you all by her side loving her. Big hugs to you all. ❤️Joan

Jeni, Kyle, Aeden & Ezra Winningham 2023-05-10 09:23:07

John, Taylor, Jr. McKenzie, Awstin, and family - I am so sorry for your loss. I remember Aunt Tess very well. She was a wonderful woman. Now she is with Yiayia and the rest of the family and her beloved Charles. Our thoughts and love are with you during this time and the days to come.

Diana 2023-05-10 09:33:44

Sending my condolences to you all. I’m so sorry. Tess will definitely be missed. Sending Prayers to you all ❤️

Wayne & Geri Alberts 2023-05-10 12:11:28

It is so very difficult to lose the unconditional love of a parent! Our hearts go out to the entire Hutton & Sharp families. Hugs and love to you all♥️

Zuhaib khan 2023-05-12 14:52:27

I was deeply saddened to hear about the loss of your mother. Please accept my sincere condolences. During this difficult time, I want you to know that you are in my thoughts and prayers. May cherished memories and the love of those around you bring you comfort and strength in the days ahead. With deepest sympathy, Zuhaib and Family

Sheri Meketa and Jerry Marsh 2023-05-19 07:46:38

Remembering your wonderful mother and sending you lots of hugs, she will be missed!
